author: bomrP4c8hBGiCnut
command:
/**
 ***************************************************************
 * This macro can be used to reset the luck points of all
 * characters set as the user's main character.
 *
 * NOTE: Only users with the Game Master user role can run this
 * macro.
 **************************************************************/

fallout.macros.resetLuckPoints();
name: Reset Luck Points (GM)
